text: Colonel Thomas Ewing (1730-1790) was a commander of the 3rd Battalion of the Maryland Flying Camp under the command of Brigadier General Rezin Beall during the American Revolutionary War. Under Ewing's command were 12 companies of infantry with 864 men and 2 companies of artillery. ==References== Category:Continental Army officers from Maryland Category:People of colonial Maryland Category:1730 births Category:1790 deaths
title: Thomas Ewing (American Revolution)
